channel.title: First server! (ZDR)
channel.description:
Probably gonna get flamed for this not really botherd, but the owner of ZDR "ben" gave my mate the source and because he couldn't host he let me do it, the server will be on 24/7 only every hour it will restart for like 5 seconds or less.
I havn't changed anything on this server it will not be changed it's the same as the real owner had it. If you want me to get pictures i will i just assumed you knew what the source is, but if not i'll get pics.
i just released this yesterday and i'm hoping to get loads of players So far 50 downloads
Client: http://uppit.com/FKMGVL
Forums: www.theukpk.co.nr
If you want to play this server pm me or go to forums and go to annoucments, remember to play you need the client, well you don't but if you don't use the client you won't see any items! (btw thanks dd for telling me to post here) About the server: Most skill capes have emotes, fully working prayers, fully working dagger specials, moving fire capes, great pking spots, good timing on all weapons/mage/range.
Don't flame for taking someone elses server i'm just hosting,
Remember the server is 24/7! no lagg

item.title: First server! (ZDR)
item.dc:creator: @i_bl33d_i i bl33d i
item.description:
@i_bl33d_i wrote:

oh crap, i got told to post here and say if you want to play pm me
